name: Investigate and Consolidate Agent Status Definitions
description: There are multiple ways agent status is represented: AgentStatus enum in coordination/enums.py, AgentStatus Literal in automation/cursor_orchestrator.py, and simple derived status in coordination/base_agent.py. Investigate if these can be consolidated. Should BaseAgent use the core AgentStatus enum? Should CursorOrchestrator use it, or a more specific enum? Refactor code to use a single, consistent approach for representing the core operational status of an agent.
